EmailTemplate.subject: Safari365: Reminder to receive your complimentary photo book
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.FirstName},
We have noticed that you have not uploaded your photographs for your complimentary photo book.
We wanted to let you know that the offer is still available if you are interested. Click this link and proceed to the ‘photo book section’ to upload directly: https://www.safari365.com/members/login/{!Opportunity.Members_Club_ID__c}
Should you not want your photo book, please ignore this email, we will not send you another reminder
Kind regards,
Safari365 Photo Book Department
